Object containing the definition of a Storage Target.
Docs.summary: Create or update a Storage Target. This operation is allowed at any time, but if the Cache is down or unhealthy, the actual creation/modification of the Storage Target may be delayed until the Cache is healthy again.

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
Name of Cache. Length of name must not be greater than 80 and chars must be from the [-0-9a-zA-Z_] char class.
Docs.summary: Removes a Storage Target from a Cache. This operation is allowed at any time, but if the Cache is down or unhealthy, the actual removal of the Storage Target may be delayed until the Cache is healthy again. Note that if the Cache has data to flush to the Storage Target, the data will be flushed before the Storage Target will be deleted.
